articles.title: The long road to recovery after sexual abuse
articles.description: How does someone recover from being a victim of sexual abuse? One man from Western New York tells his tale of recovery after being abused by a priest as a child

articles.author: Zoë Carpenter
articles.title: ‘These Kids Are Watching Their Parents Die’
articles.description: Zoë Carpenter For children growing up in the shadow of the opioid crisis, public schools have become the safety net of last resort. The post ‘These Kids Are Watching Their Parents Die’ appeared first on The Nation.
